page.title: 08INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: There are several interesting people who have lived or worked in the area which we have had to study. Peter Davies is a well known bird expert, author and broadcaster. He lives on Marley Common. Molly Hyde, the former England Ladies Cricket Captain, is actively involved in the work of the National Trust in the area. She is President of the Blackdown committee. The area is close to Haslemere station, within an hour of Waterloo by fast train. This means that many wealthy and influential commuters have chosen to make their homes in the attractive setting. They include active and retired judges, businessmen, stockbrokers, Ambassadors and other notabilities.
